Text.Value: I'm not going to make you go away.
I am not a 'skellie'. Thou shalt call me Withers.
Arabella will depart, once thou dost leave these accursed lands. She will find her way safely; thus it is fated.
But it is unbalanced. Her yoke is already heavy; if she walks thy path, it will surely break.
Thy parents have left for the Fugue Plane. They are, in a word, dead.
THOU MUST.
The girl must learn the ways of the arcane - but she shan't remain here.

EditorData.VFXTags: [MO] Player is surrounded by black flames.

Text.Value: You can trust Withers. If he says you'll be safe, you should believe him.
Awh... boooring.
If there are people like you around, perhaps everything will be all right.

EditorData.NodeContext: Warm glow fades. Arabella wipes a tear from her cheek as she looks at the player

Text.Value: NO!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV], [Arabella] She starts tensing and clenching her fists, [Player] reacts to her being suddenly surrounded by black fire
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Black flames surround Arabella as her anger grows. (Visualisation can be changed if needed, see Kevin V.)

Arabella's anger grows as black flames surround her, a magical manifestation of her hurt and rage.
EditorData.NodeContext: Arabella's anger grows and black flames surround her as she yells, a magical manifestation of her hurt and rage.

Text.Value: Bone Man, you're making me leave?
Thou shan't leave. The girl must know the truth.
No...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV], [Arabella] in disbelief shoots, glances between the player and Withers expectantly
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Arabella in disbelief shoots glances between the player and Withers expectantly
EditorData.NodeContext: In disbelief and anger, hearing her parents  have died.

Text.Value: It's wonderful...
Arabella holds a power beyond reckoning. That of the decaying forest, and the seedling that bore it.
Thou mayest deny truth. I do not.
I'm glad to see you're getting along.
The Weave knows her purpose. It will guide her plainly, if she listens.
Balance.
The truth? Wait. What do you mean?
Leave.
She will tame it in time. The Weave would not see one like her abandoned.
'Withers'? I'm not going to remember that! I'm calling you 'Bone Man'.
Listen. Dost thou not hear it? Where creation meets ruin, where morning meets midnight - the root of all being.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Calmly, even as Arabella's magic rages. Addressed to Arabella.
EditorData.NodeContext: Calmly, even as Arabella's magic rages. Addressed to Arabella.

Text.Value: Balance.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Calm now. Addressed to Withers, though more or less said to herself.
EditorData.NodeContext: Calm now. Addressed to Withers, though more or less said to hersel.

Text.Value: She is ready. I have deemed it so.
Breathe, child. Resist not the winds of change. Let them carry thee.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Withers is speaking calmly to the child Arabella, to keep her from blowing up over finding out her parents are dead.

Text.Value: I'd rather thou didst not.
I... *Sob.*
Hey Bone Man, can you make your teeth chatter?
Hey - you never said you were friends with a skellie!
Where will she go, then?
I don't believe it. They can't be...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Arabella is speaking with Withers. She is distraught about her parents' death and beginning to lose control.

Text.Value: Speak, and let it be done.

EditorData.stateContext: Arabella is no longer surrounded by black flame. Player is surrounded by black flame.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV], [Arabella] loop of previous node's idle, [Player] gets imbued by Arabellla's powers (as if it hit them in the belly, but softly), and reacts to fire envelopping them looking at their body
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The black flames fade from Arabella and envelop the player.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MO] Black flames fades from arabella to the player.

Text.Value: *A single image haunts your mind - a tiefling corpse, carelessly mauled in the so-called House of Healing.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Needs to remain so the player is sure to connect  the corpse with this moment.

Text.Value: I can, but I will not.
Fear not, girl. Abandon not the Weave, and it shall not abandon thee.
Thank you, Bone Man. For being... nice.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV] Arabella tensed breathes deeply, exhales and relaxes a little
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Arabella breathes and begins to calm.

Text.Value: *You feel her grief fade as if it were your own - there is a lightness in her now, veiling the power within, soothing it.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV] Withers does a slow, calm spell motion with one relaxed hand towards Arabella (as an Idle). *REUSE* Player looks at their body engulfed in now white flames
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MO] Black flames turn from black to white and then become a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

Text.Value: As I would expect.
Your parents are dead, Arabella.

EditorData.stateContext: Arabella is surrounded by shockingly intense black flames.

Text.Value: Fine with me. She's already outstayed her welcome.
Why not? I'm not sending her out there alone.

EditorData.stateContext: Arabella is surrounded by black flames.

Text.Value: No. It isn't the right time.
Fear not, girl. The Weave knows thy purpose. It will guide thee, if thou dost listen.
You will not. You cannot.
He's funny - like my grandpa when he didn't get his nap.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to player. She's mocking Withers here.

Text.Value: Very well.
*Your very soul is tangled in shadow. Arabella's magic, wild as cursed briar. Her talent is now yours, too.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player is now surrounded by black flames
EditorData.VFXTags: [MO] Player is surrounded by black flames.
EditorData.logicalname: Player gets Arabella's power of cursed entanglement

Text.Value: Tell her yourself, if it means that much.
Is that my future? Is that why they died?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV], [Player] *REUSE* CAMP_Gale_CRD_TeachSpell_Sourronded_LOOP, [Withers] *REUSE* Spell cast from 2 nodes before as an Idle
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Arabella peers at Withers' magic in wonder.
EditorData.NodeContext: Arabella peers at Withers' magic in wonder.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MO] Warm glow emvelopping Arabella and the player.

Text.Value: Who could teach the girl? Her magic is even wilder than mine.
I will teach her. I will help her channel the Weave.
I need Withers' services.
Soon enough. But first, thou must tend to the girl. It is time she learns the truth.
'Bone Man', huh? I like it.
I'm sorry. I wish it could be different.
It is.
Leave.

EditorData.stateContext: Arabella and player enveloped in warm glow.

Text.Value: Bad news, Arabella. Your parents are dead.
What about 'no' don't you understand?
I speak not with malice, but with prudence.
They're dead... I can't...

EditorData.NodeContext: Still disturbed by learning of her parents, but calming

Synopsis: Arabella and Withers interact in camp. You can tell Arabella her parents are dead, leading to Withers calming her down. You learn her power and she will get sent off to Sorcerous SUndires after the end of Act 2
